author: lektran
msg: Applied patch from BJ Freeman OFBIZ-3741, layoutSettings.VT_SHORTCUT_ICON was unable to take effect because layoutSettings.shortcutIcon always has content

author: gstein
msg: Remove const from the return work items. They're allocated in the
RESULT_POOL, and avalable for callers to mess around with. In particular,
we want non-const in order to link work items together.
parameter, and directly build the work item into the parameter.
remove const from work item variables.

author: lhazlewood
msg: Ensured CodecSupport and the SimpleCredentialsMatcher's check for a byte source is easier and also supports the ByteSource type.

author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-153 - altered code to allow all bean configuration to be based on what is in the [main] section.  The [filters] section is now deprecated.

author: billbarker
msg: portals-bridges-common seems to have gone away.  see if the other projects can handle it being gone
